other_title: くりいむレモンPART4 「POP チェイサー」 (Japanese)
plot: Arriving at the quiet town of Neo Cansas, Rio lodges herself at the Sailor Uniform Saloon, the only bar/hotel around. Mai, a waitress who works at the saloon, asks Rio to deal with a gang that is terrorizing town. Rio offers her help and Mai is very thankful for that.
